Levels.1: Every 10 auto attacks your next attack will deal a random damage type to the enemy.
Levels.5: Every 5 auto attacks your next attack will deal a random damage type to the enemy and deals 2x damage.
Levels.10: Every 5 auto attacks your next attack will deal a random damage type to the enemy and deals 2.5x damage.

Levels.1: Cause it to rain for 3 seconds, during this rain your speed is doubled.
Levels.5: Cause it to rain for 6 seconds, during this rain your speed is doubled.
Levels.10: Cause it to rain for 9 seconds, during this rain your speed is doubled.

Levels.1: Cause it to rain for 6 seconds, during this rain your speed is doubled.
Levels.5: Cause it to rain for 9 seconds, during this rain your speed is doubled.
Levels.10: Cause it to rain for 12 seconds, during this rain your speed is doubled.

Levels.1: Cause it to rain for 3 seconds, during this rain regain 1/16 of maximum HP after each auto attack.
Levels.5: Cause it to rain for 6 seconds, during this rain regain 1/16 of maximum HP after each auto attack.
Levels.10: Cause it to rain for 9 seconds, during this rain regain 1/16 of maximum HP after each auto attack.
